messages.title: Backing the NHS
messages.content: The NHS is our number one priority. We back it and we want to improve it for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut Labour waste to stop this tax rise. Will cut borrowing to £1,000 a year with the Conservatives, out of 10 working people at least 7 will be better off.
The Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year. NHS needs the investments as the pressure is increasing.
Returning power to local communities, Conservatives will give back power to local communities.

issues.economy: Cut Labour waste to stop this tax rise. Will cut borrowing to £1,000 a year with the Conservatives.
issues.governance: Returning power to local communities, Conservatives will give back power to local communities.
issues.health: The Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year.

endorsements.endorser: Mary Mears, Leader of Brighton & Hove Council. Conservative Councillor for Rottingdean Coastal Ward
endorsements.endorsement: Mike has a proven track record in business and understands the needs of our city
